channel.title: I can get on server but no1 else can
channel.description: i am running whitescape source and ive done everything and no1 can log into it except me

item.title: I can get on server but no1 else can
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

Create a network for it on hamachi. Then everyone will be able to loginto it using youre ip if they join the network.

P.S. Are you using the localhost way to get into ure server (instead of typing in ip you type in localhost) Cuz I think you are. Only the owner of the server can do that. Thats why you need to make hamachi ffs.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 05:55:54 PM[/size][hr]hope that helped ya.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 05:56:50 PM[/size][hr]You could at least say thank you![br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 06:02:48 PM[/size][hr]Btw what is ure server?

Read full topic
